title: if...else
description: The `if...else` JS syntax statement is a control structure that executes a block of code if a specified condition is `true` and optionally executes another block of code if the condition is `false`.
content: The statement used as a control structure for conditional execution of code. If a specified condition is `true`, the code inside the `if` block is executed; otherwise, if an `else` block is provided, the code inside it's executed.
